mapper.select:
select
(amountValue) as avg,s.caption,d.moment,t.unit
from db_vibe_data.t_sample_float_day d left join db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e on d.monitor=e.probe_id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p on d.monitor=p.id left join db_vibe_basic.t_code t on t.id=e.itemize_type left join db_vibe_monitor.t_space s on p.parent=s.id where s.id = #{parent} and d.moment like #{date} and e.value_type=1 and e.itemize_type=#{type}
order by (moment)

select p.id
from db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p left join db_vibe_monitor.t_space s on p.parent=s.id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e on p.id=e.probe_id left join db_vibe_basic.t_code t on t.id=e.itemize_type left join db_vibe_monitor.t_asset_prop o on o.asset=p.id where e.itemize_type = #{type} and o.name = "AmountOfChange";

select g.id from db_vibe_monitor.t_space g
g.parent = #{parent} or g.parent =1
g.id = #{parent} or g.parent=#{parent}
ORDER BY g.id , g.name desc

select
(amountValue) as avg,s.caption,d.moment
from db_vibe_data.t_sample_float_hour d left join db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e on d.monitor=e.probe_id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p on d.monitor=p.id left join db_vibe_basic.t_code t on t.id=e.itemize_type left join db_vibe_monitor.t_space s on p.parent=s.id where s.id = #{parent} and e.value_type=1 and e.itemize_type=#{type}
and (d.moment between #{startTime} and #{firstDayNext}) order by (moment)

SELECT d.avg value,t.name,t.unit FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.parent = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id
t.`name` is not null and e.value_type=1
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
AND d.moment LIKE '${startTime}%'
GROUP BY t.NAME ORDER BY d.avg ASC
select parent from db_vibe_basic.t_code where id=${catalog}

SELECT COALESCE(sum(amountValue),0) as value FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.id = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id
s.parent = 0 and e.value_type=1
and itemize_type = ${parentCatalog}
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
and d.moment like '${startTime}%'

/*SELECT t.id as floorId,t.caption as floor FROM db_vibe_monitor.t_space t where parent = 1 or t.id =1;*/ SELECT t.id as floorId,t.caption as floor,t.parent parentId FROM db_vibe_monitor.t_space t order by t.seqence;

SELECT sum(amountValue) as dqzh,d.moment as date FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.id = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id where
s.id= ${floorId} and e.value_type=1 and itemize_type = ${catalog}
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
and d.moment like '${startTime}%'
group by d.moment
SELECT t.unit from db_vibe_basic.t_code t where id =${catalog}

SELECT (amountValue) as value,d.moment as time,t.unit as unit, t.name,s.caption as floor FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.id = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id where s.id= ${floorId} and e.value_type=1 and itemize_type = ${catalog}
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
and d.moment like '${startTime}%'
group by d.moment

SELECT COALESCE(sum(amountValue),0) FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.id = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id where s.id= ${floorId} and itemize_type = ${itemize_type} and e.value_type=1
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
and d.moment like '${startTime}%'
group by d.moment

SELECT truncate(sum(amountValue),2) AS value ,d.moment AS Time ,t.unit FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.id = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id where s.id= ${floor} and itemize_type = ${catalog} and e.value_type=1
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
and d.moment like '${startTime}%'
group by d.moment

SELECT truncate(sum(amountValue),2) AS value ,t.unit,t.name FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.id = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id where s.id= ${floor} and t.parent = ${catalog} and e.value_type=1
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
and d.moment like '${startTime}%'
group by t.id order by value asc

SELECT sum(amountValue) AS value ,t.unit,t.name FROM db_vibe_data.${tableName} d LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e ON d.monitor = e.probe_id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON d.monitor = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code t ON t.id = e.itemize_type LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON p.parent = s.id where s.id= ${floor} and t.parent = ${catalog} and e.value_type=1
and d.moment between '${startTime}' and '${lastTime}'
and d.moment like '${startTime}%'
group by t.id order by value asc

SELECT f.moment as time,f.value as value,p.caption as name,s.caption FROM db_vibe_data.t_sample_float f LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p on f.monitor=p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_device d on d.id = p.parent LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s on s.id = d.parent LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e on e.probe_id = p.id where e.value_type=0 and f.moment BETWEEN '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and p.catalog = ${catalog}
and e.meter_type=0 ORDER BY f.monitor,f.moment

SELECT f.moment as time,f.value as value,p.caption as name,s.caption FROM db_vibe_data.t_sample_float f LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p on f.monitor=p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s on s.id = p.parent LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy e on e.probe_id = p.id where f.moment BETWEEN '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' and p.catalog = ${catalog} and e.value_type=0 and e.meter_type=0
ORDER BY f.monitor,f.moment

select #{year} year,#{month} month ,p.name nameId ,p.caption name,p.id value from db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy en LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p on en.probe_id = p.id where en.value_type = 0 and p.catalog = #{catalog}
select f.value from db_vibe_data.t_sample_float f where f.moment BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and f.monitor = #{monitor} ORDER BY f.moment desc LIMIT 1
